title: Whole-nation approach needed to fight extremism, terrorism: DG ISPR
content:
Director-General Maj Gen Babar, Inter-Services Public Relations Iftikhar in in a press conference on Monday called for a “whole of nation approach” to fight terrorism and extremism.
LIVE #APPNews : DG ISPR Major General Babar Iftikhar  addressing Press conference #Rawalpindi . @OfficialDGISPR https://t.co/Dorn66IY9E
— APP  (@appcsocialmedia) February 22, 2021
